page.title: 09Dairy farming at Bank Farm.
page.content: Mr Williams has a farm of 70 acres he has 35 friesian cows and he feeds them on sileage,fodder beet,swede,hay, kale,barley and straw.He is going to plant corn to feed the cows on.From one cow in one year he gets 4500 litres(1000 gallons)two cows are not milking because they are going to calf soon,4 calves are under 12 months old. The milk tanker comes at 10.00.He starts milking at 6.30am and 4.30pm. He also has beef cattle and dairy herd replacements. Machinery:-3 tractors,1 buck rake,1 straw chopper,1 sileage chopper,1 mower,1 turner,1 bailer,1 drill,1 plough,1 seeder,1 roller,1 loader, 1 muckspreader,1 fertilizer,several trailers. Labour:-Family only.
